code: class  PeekingIterator  :  public  Iterator  {   public :   PeekingIterator ( const  vector < int >&  nums )  :  Iterator ( nums )  {}     int  peek ()  {       return  Iterator ( * this ). next ();   }       int  next ()  {   return  Iterator :: next ();   }   bool  hasNext ()  const  {   return  Iterator :: hasNext ();   }  };
